ISSUE.TITLE: Make all methods "virtual" in the AttributeService
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70 We need to mark all methods in the AttributeService class as virtual (see details in [this commet](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/2830#issuecomment-2206031480))

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge branch '4.70-bug-fixes' into develop # Conflicts: # src/Libraries/Nop.Core/NopVersion.cs

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7253 Marked all methods as "virtual" in the AttributeService
